name: 8th Edition of International Conference on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies
content: The 8th Edition of the International Conference on Traditional Medicine, Ethnomedicine and Natural Therapies (Traditional Med 2025) is scheduled to take place from June 5-7, 2025, in the historic city of Rome, Italy. This highly anticipated hybrid event will offer both onsite and online participation options, ensuring accessibility and inclusivity for a global audience. Under the theme "Global Perspectives on Traditional Medicine: Diversity, Sustainability, and Accessibility," Traditional Medicine Conferences 2025 aims to bring together leading experts, practitioners, and researchers to explore the rich diversity of traditional medicine practices worldwide. The conference will delve into sustainable practices and the accessibility of traditional medicine, fostering a deeper understanding of its global impact. Participants can expect a robust program featuring keynote speeches, panel discussions, and interactive workshops, providing a comprehensive platform for knowledge exchange and collaboration. Join Ethnomedicine Conferences 2025 in Rome or virtually to be part of this pivotal event in the field of traditional medicine.
